describe: Iraq, located in Western Asia, is known for its rich history as part of ancient Mesopotamia. It is bordered by Turkey, Iran, Kuwait, Saudi Arabia, Jordan, and Syria. The country has a diverse culture with influences from various civilizations over millennia.

cities.name: üèú Baghdad
cities.geographical_location: Located along the Tigris River in central Iraq.
cities.climate: Baghdad has a hot desert climate with extremely hot summers and mild, wet winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Masgouf, a traditional grilled fish dish, and kebabs.

cities.name: üèú Basra
cities.geographical_location: Situated in the southern part of Iraq near the Persian Gulf.
cities.climate: Basra experiences a hot desert climate with very hot summers and mild winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Samak Masgouf and various seafood dishes.

cities.name: üå≥ Erbil
cities.geographical_location: Located in the northern part of Iraq in the Kurdistan Region.
cities.climate: Erbil has a semi-arid climate with hot summers and cold, wet winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Dolma and kebabs, with influences from Kurdish cuisine.
